main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Uruguay on May 29, 1955, with the conclusion indicating it was a balloon.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 21:30 hours, The observation did not report the length of time, There was one object observed moving south, The investigation was conducted by the Centro de Investigacion de Objetos Voladores Identificados in Uruguay, The report included unconfirmed comments on the object's rapid speed and brightness.
